meanings.definition: A type of medication used to treat depression, anxiety disorders, and other mental health conditions.
meanings.sent1: My doctor prescribed paroxetine to help me with my anxiety.
meanings.sent2: She takes paroxetine every morning to manage her depression.
meanings.sent3: The paroxetine bottle danced on the shelf, eager to provide relief.
meanings.sent4: His mind became a clear sky after taking paroxetine, the clouds of anxiety dissipating.
meanings.sent5: The paroxetine pill was a tiny hero fighting against the monsters of depression.
